name: The Pit (itch) (carlosgonzalez)
description:
An online party game where you must compete with everyone else to find and hold the treasure! Game made  for the  Ludum Dare 48 Event.

Controls (PC Only): W - Move forward S - Move backward A - Move left D - Move right Space - Jump

To play:

  1. Everyone download the build.
  2. Run the build.
  3. Once you see all your friends in the lobby, hit the block to start playing - this is important, you can’t join when the game is in progress.
  4. Dig your way down and find the treasure!
  5. If you do, you must hold it for 10 seconds to win! Other players can hit you and steal it.
  6. Scream as much as we did :)
